name: MOUSE (handmanart)
description:
You're mouse just trying to get some munchies. Avoid the Humans and you might get to go home scot-free.

  • Use Arrows and WASD for movement.
  • Click to explore, find lore, and hear your character's thoughts. 

*While you should be able to get play in the browser if you're looking for a speedy loading screen it would be best to download the .exe for more immediate gameplay. :) If you can get it to work great, if you don't please don't be discouraged. Best*
